3820af25-b57f-4713-a1eb-062633ec1434.description: Earners of 2000 points IEAA Fellowship badge are half-way towards becoming an IEAA Associate Fellow. They have shown dedication and commitment to engage and serve the International Education community and be recognised through the IEAA Fellowship program. IEAA Fellowship program recognises and rewards IEAA members for their education, experience and engagement within the IEAA and the broader International Education community.
3820af25-b57f-4713-a1eb-062633ec1434.name: 2000 points towards IEAA Fellowship

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Considerable education, experience and engagement with Australia's international education community. (IEAA Fellowship points range: 2,000-3,999).

d721e42e-ae60-495e-b63c-160d664fc24a.description: IEAA Associate Fellows (IEAA-AF) have demonstrated considerable commitment to enhancing their career and engaging with the broader international education sector. They recognise the value of, and actively participate in, a range of education and ongoing professional learning activities. They are willing to share their knowledge and seek opportunities to give back to the broader sector.
d721e42e-ae60-495e-b63c-160d664fc24a.name: IEAA Associate Fellow (IEAA-AF)

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Considerable education, experience and engagement with Australia's international education sector. (IEAA Fellowship points range: 4,000-6,999+)

880cafb7-f158-4307-9218-5bcec4c07ecb.description: Earners of IEAA's International Education Essentials badge have a broad understanding of Australia’s place in the global education sector and its social, cultural and economic importance to Australia. They can source key international student statistics to identify recent trends and have an awareness of the external factors that can affect these numbers. Earners can articulate how this broader context relates back to their role and are aware of future challenges and opportunities for the sector.
880cafb7-f158-4307-9218-5bcec4c07ecb.name: IEAA International Education Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on International Education Essentials.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

bf06c9fe-56a6-47f4-9f25-87258ad0ae63.description: Earners of IEAA's Marketing and Recruitment Strategy badge understand the core components of an integrated marketing strategy and the key channels to consider as part of an international student recruitment plan. They know the importance of education agents and how to optimise digital recruitment channels to engage international prospects. They appreciate the importance of alumni in the recruitment process and understand future trends and opportunities in international marketing and recruitment.
bf06c9fe-56a6-47f4-9f25-87258ad0ae63.name: IEAA Marketing and Recruitment Strategy

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on Marketing and Recruitment Strategy.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

b16d9ece-2f43-4121-850a-b3d0b1513542.description: IEAA Fellows (IEAA-F) have demonstrated significant commitment to their career and engaging with the broader international education sector. They recognise the value of, and actively contribute to, a range of education and ongoing professional learning activities. They seek opportunities to engage with and give back, both in and outside their immediate workplace, for the betterment of the broader sector.
b16d9ece-2f43-4121-850a-b3d0b1513542.name: IEAA Fellow (IEAA-F)

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Significant education, experience and engagement with Australia's international education sector. (IEAA Fellowship points range: 7,000-9,999)

81b1b2fc-ae47-4942-bf1b-5c638ad8df15.description: Holders of IEAA's Data Demystified badge understand the importance of data and analytics to Australia's international education sector. They know where to locate resources and how to collect information on student numbers, commencements and enrolments. They know the importance of nurturing an analytical mindset and have an understanding of data analysis and data metrics. They also understand the importance of data visualisation and communicating data with a valuable and convincing narrative.
81b1b2fc-ae47-4942-bf1b-5c638ad8df15.name: IEAA Data Demystified

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on Data Demystified.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

4fcf556f-0112-4164-a577-3cc449ca52be.description: Earners of IEAA's Admissions and Compliance Essentials badge understand the regulatory framework that governs international education in Australia. They understand Australia's immigration context, its application to the Simplified Student Visa Framework (SSVF) and the process for determining the eligibility of international applicants. They also know the foundations for admissions processes and systems, and managing risk, at an institutional level.
4fcf556f-0112-4164-a577-3cc449ca52be.name: IEAA Admissions and Compliance Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on Admissions and Compliance Essentials.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

b7d048a2-d776-4748-8ca7-f8feb1b55c0b.description: IEAA Senior Fellows (IEAA-SF) have demonstrated long-term commitment to Australia’s international education sector. As a leader in the field, they actively share their knowledge and expertise through a variety of networking and professional learning opportunities. Their contribution to Australia’s international education community stands to enhance not only their own careers, but that of their broader networks and the wider international education sector.
b7d048a2-d776-4748-8ca7-f8feb1b55c0b.name: IEAA Senior Fellow (IEAA-SF)

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Exceptional education, experience and engagement with Australia's international education sector. (IEAA Fellowship points range: 10,000+)

7eb592d5-6e51-4cd2-8aa0-aa2d186411be.description: Earners of IEAA's Mapping Transnational Education badge have a broad understanding of the various forms and framework of transnational education as it applies to Australia's international education sector. They have the knowledge to assess business and academic considerations when new opportunities arise and understand the importance of regulatory requirements and quality management in TNE operating environments.
7eb592d5-6e51-4cd2-8aa0-aa2d186411be.name: IEAA Mapping Transnational Education

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on Mapping Transnational Education.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

07156c2a-8c97-4c32-bcb8-de39d0619964.description: After completion of this badge, earners know the fundamentals of working in a learning abroad office, including staffing structures and the role of technology. They understand each stage of the student lifecycle in learning abroad; how to establish, manage and assess programs and how these programs fit within the broader internationalised curriculum. They also know the fundamentals of risk management in the context of learning abroad.
07156c2a-8c97-4c32-bcb8-de39d0619964.name: IEAA Unpacking Learning Abroad

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on Unpacking Learning Abroad.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

5664c57f-b042-457e-b2fe-6f79f2579898.description: Earners of IEAA's Teaching and Learning Across Cultures badge know what global learning is and how it applies to local contexts. They understand the principles of reviewing and redesigning the curriculum using the Internationalisation of the Curriculum (IoC) methodology. They can apply good practice principles to implement and evaluate effective teaching and learning across cultures, and develop a pedagogical rationale for integrating technology into global teaching and learning.
5664c57f-b042-457e-b2fe-6f79f2579898.name: IEAA Teaching and Learning Across Cultures

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on Teaching and Learning Across Cultures.
Successfully complete of all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

7543d2d1-dd1a-4009-9b74-d0d91ed58e78.description: Earners of IEAA's International Student Life badge have a solid understanding of the factors that can affect the international student experience. This includes appropriate health, safety and wellbeing, accommodation, employability and the benefits of engaging international students in their local communities. Earners will have the capacity to relate what they have learnt to their own professional context, as well as the broader implications for their future work in the sector.
7543d2d1-dd1a-4009-9b74-d0d91ed58e78.name: IEAA International Student Life

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on International Student Life.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective and research exercises, required for the module.

37a4c8a9-05f0-4407-9173-2b8009d55d41.description: The International Student Driver Delivery Training Program is an educational training program on work rights, road safety, and legal rights and responsibilities for international students who are supplementing their income in Australia through the gig-economy of food delivery driving. The Program was jointly created by the Fit2Drive network, Swinburne University, D’Accord OAS, and JobWatch Inc with funding from Study Melbourne, to educate new arrivals and existing vulnerable cohorts.
37a4c8a9-05f0-4407-9173-2b8009d55d41.name: IEAA Best Practice Award 2021 - International Student Driver Delivery Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: This award recognises the work of an individual or team that has contributed to international education through a groundbreaking development in international development, internationalisation of the curriculum, marketing or recruitment, international support programs, pathway, learning abroad or social inclusion initiatives.

4d5547f5-e2e4-46a3-a8e5-ebd04d438258.description: Earners of IEAA's Scholarships and Fellowships Fundamentals badge know the different types, purposes and goals of various scholarship programs. They have an awareness of socio-political contexts and how they can impact different scholarship holders. They know the importance of on-award support and activities to enhance the student experience. They have an understanding of the different avenues through which education providers can access funding opportunities.
4d5547f5-e2e4-46a3-a8e5-ebd04d438258.name: IEAA Scholarships and Fellowships Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on International Scholarships and Fellowships Fundamentals.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

6cf03f30-a311-4c73-ba99-130862cf2247.description: Australian business schools must develop international student employability and build Environmental and Social Responsibility (ESR) capabilities. Innovatively, a team from the Deakin Business School prepares Master of Information Systems students for employment in Australia and overseas by engaging students with industry expectations and ESR using real business problems and practice, and supporting students in developing transferable skills and evaluative judgement.
6cf03f30-a311-4c73-ba99-130862cf2247.name: IEAA Best Practice Award 2021 - International Students to Responsible Information Systems Professionals

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: This award recognises the work of an individual or team that has contributed to international education through a groundbreaking development in international development, internationalisation of the curriculum, marketing or recruitment, international support programs, pathway, learning abroad or social inclusion initiatives.

8251f740-736b-41ac-8225-e98568be3c2e.description: Earners of IEAA's International Pathway Programs badge understand the various types of pathway programs as they apply to international students. They know the origins of pathway programs in Australia, as well as their global context in international education. They know the fundamentals of how programs are structured and their importance to partner education providers. They are aware of best practice in subject design and principles for developing quality programs to enhance student success.
8251f740-736b-41ac-8225-e98568be3c2e.name: IEAA Paving Pathways

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete IEAA's online learning module on International Pathway Programs.
Successfully complete all learning tasks, including written reflective exercises, required for the module.

7cab7dc8-6fe4-4a4a-b8a3-c99a5fcd8851.description: The Cross-cultural engagement with students from the subcontinent: academic and professional staff resource kit was developed by a research team within CQUniveristy to educate new and existing academic and professional staff to better understand the unique cross-cultural challenges that confront international students, especially relating to cultural communication styles, learning barriers, learning styles, and learning practices. The resource kit is available to any university.
7cab7dc8-6fe4-4a4a-b8a3-c99a5fcd8851.name: IEAA Best Practice Award 2022 - Cross-cultural engagement with students from the subcontinent: academic and professional staff resource kit

issuer.summary: issued by International Education Association of Australia (IEAA)

badge_template_activities.title: This award recognises the work of an individual or team that has contributed to international education through a groundbreaking development in international development, internationalisation of the curriculum, marketing or recruitment, international support programs, pathway, learning abroad or social inclusion initiatives. Proudly sponsored by The University of Sydney.
